title: Problems Installing HELP!!
body: I recently purchased an Acer Aspire E 15  E5-573G-52G3 and have continued to try and download League of Legends on Windows 10.  It has partially downloaded and opened it to download the final part on the LOL client.  It reaches a certain percent like 5% or 11% then crashes.  I then go to turn it on and it has reset the download.  I have repeated this multiple times and every time it crashes and resets.  I am not sure what is wrong I have not downloaded anything onto the computer except League of Legends, and I have had it for about 4 hours by now.  I would really appreciate any help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried reinstalling the application (Download a fresh copy of the installer) and seeing if the issue persists?
